summary: This mod aims to make Harkon, Valerica and Serana look more vampiric by changing their class to Nord Vampire, rather than Nord Human.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a request from my Serana fixed mod, but I decided to make a seperate mod to avoid confusion. Please let me know if you encounter any issues.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0 is available!

With any luck, this mod will simply work as intended and will not require any updates. It does nothing more than set harkon, Valerica and Serana to Nord Vampires, rather than nord humans, making their fangs visible.
author: Doozerpindan
